author: The Spun
title: Ground News - Michael Irvin Issues Warning To Cowboys Star Micah Parsons
text:
Summary by The Spun INDIANAPOLIS, INDIANA - MARCH 03: Michael Irvin of NFL Network looks on during the NFL Combine at Lucas Oil Stadium on March 03, 2022 in Indianapolis, Indiana. (Photo by Justin Casterline/Getty Images)Justin Casterline/Getty Images Dallas Cowboys star defender Micah Parsons raised a few eyebrows with his comments about San Francisco 49ers quarterback Brock Purdy over the weekend.“Down 21 and there no shots or development throws!” Parsons tweet… Share menu More
